abstract: Iran’s Guardian Council ratifies nuclear pact 36 hours after Iranian Parliament accepts agreement; ratification allows Atomic Energy Organization of Iran to begin dismantling military nuclear program, step that must be completed before sanctions can be lifted.
lead_paragraph: The Guardian Council, an oversight panel with veto power, ratified a Parliament bill approving the nuclear pact, the last step needed.

headline.main: Iran Is Set to Put Nuclear Deal, Now Ratified, in Motion
headline.print_headline: Iran Is Set to Put Nuclear Deal, Now Ratified, in Motion

snippet: The Guardian Council, an oversight panel with veto power, ratified a Parliament bill approving the nuclear pact, the last step needed.
